pkgmetadata.longdescription: Carla is a fully-featured audio plugin host, with support for many audio drivers and plugin formats. It supports LADSPA, DSSI, LV2, VST2/3 and AU plugin formats, plus SF2 and SFZ file support. It uses JACK as the default and preferred audio driver but can also use other drivers like ALSA, PulseAudio and CoreAudio.
